title: siva siva shambO
sahitya:
shiva shiva shambhO shrIkaNTha vibhO



anupallavi



bhava bhaya harapArvati manOhara parama dayAkara bhakta priyakara



caraNam



skanda janaka shrI sundarAnga shubha indu shEkhara muni vandya

saccidAnanda

mandahAsa mukha nandi gaNArcita nanda harikEsha namOstutE para
